metadata.title: CVE-2020-20740 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
PDFResurrect before 0.20 lack of header validation checks causesheap-buffer-overflow in pdf_get_version().

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-20740` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pdfresurrect - 0.22-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pdfresurrect package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22-2').
